preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 40 g of neodymium, 10 g of antimony, 10 g of silicon, and 1000 g of zinc. 
 2. In a clean, dry container, mix the neodymium, antimony, and silicon thoroughly. 
 3. Gradually add the zinc while continuously stirring to ensure even distribution. 
 4. Incorporate the binder into the mixture, ensuring it is fully saturated.
